meanings.sent1: The goosiest slime oozed slowly down the table.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallows in the s'mores were the goosiest I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The goosiest mud pie was a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her goosiest hugs always made me feel warm and loved.
meanings.sent5: The goosiest cheese on the pizza stretched in long strings as I took a bite.

meanings.definition: Having the most gooey texture or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The goosiest chocolate cake melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The goosiest glue held the pieces together perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The goosiest ice cream cone dripped all over my hand.
meanings.sent4: The goosiest caramel coated the apples at the fair.
meanings.sent5: The goosiest honey stuck to my fingers as I tried to open the jar.
